products.title: Liquid Tallow Hand Soap
products.description:
Soften, nourish and restore your hands' natural oils with our all-natural tallow hand soap.  Our hand soap contains fatty acids combined with other oils that are sure to leave your hands soothed and nourished.

This beautiful glass bottle is not only eye catching next to your sink, its packaged to ensure our products are free of any harmful chemicals.
products.ingredients: Water, Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow Natural's Tallow, coconut, olive, shea butter, and castor; pure lavender essential oil, arrowroot powder, and rosemary oil extract

products.title: Whipped Tallow
products.description: Whipped Tallow is nature's best body cream. Its smooth texture, complexion correction abilities, and anti-aging properties makes it ideal for face moisturizer, eye cream, sun burn and so much more. Use Whipped Tallow for all day moisturizer as part of your daily skin care routine!
products.ingredients: Cedar Meadow Tallow sourced from our family's farm, olive oil, and lavender essential oils.

products.title: Cedar Meadow Beef Tallow
products.description: Beyond just skin care, tallow is amazing in the kitchen.  Tired of the after-taste cooking spray gives to food? Tallow is a great alternative option. It is shelf stable meaning it does not need refrigerated and can be kept by your stove for many months.

products.title: Cedar Meadow Pork Lard
products.description: Lard is a natural, traditional fat that's perfect for homesteading enthusiasts looking to embrace self-sufficiency. With its rich, hearty flavor and versatility in cooking, lard is ideal for baking, frying, and sautéing- all while being a sustainable, wholesome choice for your kitchen. Rich in nutrients and free from additives, it's a time-tested fat that brings authenticity and flavor to every meal.

products.title: Laundry Detergent
products.description: Our All-Natural Laundry Detergent is safe to even the most sensitive skin types and is color safe. One jar provides enough for 45 regular loads or 90 HE loads.  One wooden measuring scoop included with each jar
products.ingredients: Cedar Meadow Tallow, water, & Lye, Oxygen bleach, baking soda, washing soda, lavender essential oils

products.title: Lavender & Shea
products.description: Lavender Shea is a nourishing soap enriched with unrefined shea butter to soothe dry skin.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow Naturals Tallow, coconut, olive, shea butter, and castor; pure lavender essential oil, arrowroot powder, and rosemary oil extract

products.title: Vetiver & Sweet Orange
products.description: This delightfully moisturizing bar crafted with cocoa butter smells deliciously citrusy and floral. It's as wonderful as it sounds!
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow Naturals Tallow, coconut, olive, castor, and cocoa butter; pure essential oils of sweet orange, vetiver, and geranium; rose clay, and rosemary oil extract

products.title: Siberian Fir
products.description: A wonderfully soothing bar soap, Siberian Fir is crafted with cocoa butter and mineral rich sea clay for an ultra moisturizing experience.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow Naturals Tallow, coconut, olive, castor, and cocoa butter; pure essential oils of fir needle and cedar; sea clay and rosemary oil extract.

products.title: Exfoliating Herb
products.description: This soap brings the smell of the herb garden inside. Made with Sage Leaves for a gentle and exfoliating scrub. Use as hand soap or in the shower.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow Naturals Tallow, coconut, olive, castor, and shea butter; pure essential oils of rosemary, sweet basil, lemon, and eucalyptus; ground sage leaf, ground cornmeal, arrowroot powder, rosemary oil extract

products.title: Citrus Blossom
products.description: Our Citrus Blossom Soap is a bright spring scent that will cheer up any room. Enriched with mineral rich clays along with moisturizing mango butter, this bar is sure to soothe your senses.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow Naturals tallow, coconut, olive, castor, and mango butter; pure essential oils of sweet orange, patchouli, grapefruit, lemon, and litsea cubeba; rhassoul clay, moroccan clay, and rosemary oil extract.

products.title: Unscented
products.description: Pure, Simple, and as friendly as your skin could ask for, this soap is all-natural and many ingredients come from right here in Lancaster County.  The unscented bar is gentle enough for infants, giving a second option to traditional baby brands and doubles as a great option for hunters during the fall.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of Lancaster County, Cedar Meadow tallow, olive, coconut, and castor; Lancaster-grown herb tea of calendula petals, lavender, and chamomile; and rosemary oil extract.

products.title: Soap Bundle - 4pk
products.description: A 4 pack set of all your favorite soaps including Vetiver & Orange, Siberian Fir, Lavender & Shea, and Exfoliating Herb

products.title: Summer Herb Lip Balm
products.description: The freshest and softest all natural herb inspired balm. We can’t rave about this flavor enough as it is both uniquely refreshing and leaves your lips hydrated and smooth.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of avocado, shea butter, Cedar Meadow Tallow, coconut, and olive; and pure essential oils of  rosemary and spearmint.

products.title: Grapefruit Mint Lip Balm
products.description: A marriage of grapefruit and mint with a side kick of lemongrass- the perfect combination that keeps your lips coming back for more. This all- natural lip balm will leave your lips glossy and smooth.
products.ingredients: Saponified oils of avocado, shea butter, Cedar Meadow Tallow, coconut, and olive; and pure essential oils of [Mint & Grapefruit variety] grapefruit, spearmint, and litsea cubeba.
